title: PICO PARK
notes: Steam lists Shared/Split Screen Co-op and 23,206 total user reviews in all languages. Play mode inferred from description.
raw_comment: A coop puzzle game for 2-8 local players. New version with same levels as on Nintendo Switch + online mp. 8 Gamepads. 8 phones as controllers. (For 10 local players see Classic Edition.) Shared screen
